original: @ga_/dpa' @#/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin🔽bsreg gi cho ga:
analyzed: @ga_/dpa' @#/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga:
translated: The Ritual of the Single Hero's Fire Sacrifice

original: @/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya
analyzed: @/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya
translated: The Ritual of the Single Hero's Fire Sacrifice

original: gar skad du/_e ka bi ra brjod bya lha dang 'brel ba'i ma ho ma bi d+hi/_bod skad du/_ston pas
analyzed: gar skad du/_e ka bi ra brjod bya lha dang 'brel ba'i ma ho ma bi d+hi/_bod skad du/_ston pas
translated: In the language of India, Ekavīra-vadya-deva-samprayukta-mahāhoma-vidhi;

original: brjod byed kyi gzhung la yang de skad pa'i mtshhan btags pa'o/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi
analyzed: brjod byed kyi gzhung la yang de skad pa'i mtshhan btags pa'o/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi
translated: In the Tibetan language, The Ritual of the Single Hero's Fire Sacrifice.🔽Homage to the Blessed Vajraḍāka.

original: cho ga_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang po bsnyen pa bya ba
analyzed: cho ga_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang po bsnyen pa bya ba
translated: First, one should perform the approach practice.

original: nang ma sbyin bsreg byed par 'dod na sngon du yi ge bdun pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/
analyzed: nang ma sbyin bsreg byed par 'dod na sngon du yi ge bdun pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/
translated: If one wishes to perform the inner fire sacrifice, one should first do 100,000 repetitions of the seven-syllable [mantra].🔽Then, for the second, the fire sacrifice, one should first prepare the hearth.

original: de nas gnyis pa sbyin sreg las sngon du thab khung bzhi thab khung bca' ba zlum po rgya bru ba dang rtshig pa gang
analyzed: de nas gnyis pa sbyin sreg las sngon du thab khung bzhi thab khung bca' ba zlum po rgya bru ba dang rtshig pa gang
translated: Whether one makes a square or round hearth,

original: byed kyang gar khru gang pa zabs su kha khyer ma gtogs pa la khru phyed pa byas la/_nang du pad+ma
analyzed: byed kyang gar khru gang pa zabs su kha khyer ma gtogs pa la khru phyed pa byas la/_nang du pad+ma
translated: one should make it one cubit in size and half a cubit deep, except for the lip.🔽Inside, one should draw a lotus with four petals.

original: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su rdo rje dang po rtshe lnga pa bri/_kha khyer la phyir la sor bzhi gyen la bstan pa
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su rdo rje dang po rtshe lnga pa bri/_kha khyer la phyir la sor bzhi gyen la bstan pa
translated: In the center of the eight-petaled lotus, draw a five-pronged vajra.🔽One finger breadth is extended upward on the outer lip.🔽That is the lip of the hearth.

original: gcig 'ong ba de rdo rje bzhi za steng ma la rdo rje brgyad bri/_kha khyer ste de nas de'i rgyun gyi kha rgyun
analyzed: gcig 'ong ba de rdo rje bzhi za steng ma la rdo rje brgyad bri/_kha khyer ste de nas de'i rgyun gyi kha rgyun
translated: Then, the stream of that is the stream of the lip.🔽All of that is drawn white.🔽If it is cut by another, it is drawn.

original: thams cad la de thams cad dkar po la tshhon gzhan gyis bcad byas na 'bri ba'o/_/pad+ma bcu drug pa
analyzed: thams cad la de thams cad dkar po la tshhon gzhan gyis bcad byas na 'bri ba'o/_/pad+ma bcu drug pa
translated: Draw a sixteen-petaled lotus.

original: bris la thab khung gi sngon du_phyi dang de nas nang thams cad sa dkar pos byugs te de nas
analyzed: bris la thab khung gi sngon du_phyi dang de nas nang thams cad sa dkar pos byugs te de nas
translated: After that, all the outside and inside are smeared with white clay.🔽Then, the substances for drawing the signs are gathered.

original: mtshhan ma bri rdzas bsags par bya ste/_dang po 'o ma thang chu can gyi shing shug pa sogs las
analyzed: mtshhan ma bri rdzas bsags par bya ste/_dang po 'o ma thang chu can gyi shing shug pa sogs las
translated: First, the firewood is from a tree with sap, such as birch.🔽If there is no firewood, it is said to be done with dry dung.

original: bud shing med na lci ba skam gyis bya gsung brtshigs brus pa dang rtshig pa yin na kha khyer las mi mthong ba/_bris
analyzed: bud shing med na lci ba skam gyis bya gsung brtshigs brus pa dang rtshig pa yin na kha khyer las mi mthong ba/_bris
translated: If it is dug with a pickax or burned, it is drawn on the lip.

original: pa'i steng du rtshig na rgyar khru gang las mi che 'phangs su khru phyed sor bzhi las mi mtho ba la ku shas steng nas shing gi kha
analyzed: pa'i steng du rtshig na rgyar khru gang las mi che 'phangs su khru phyed sor bzhi las mi mtho ba la ku shas steng nas shing gi kha
translated: On top of that, the hearth should not be bigger than one cubit in width and not higher than one cubit and four finger-widths. It should be covered with a wooden

original: bkab nas rang la rdzas bsags pa phyag 'tshhal mchod pa me tog sogs dngos su lnga bshams te/_'og
analyzed: bkab nas rang la rdzas bsags pa phyag 'tshhal mchod pa me tog sogs dngos su lnga bshams te/_'og
translated: lid on top. Arrange the five actual offerings such as prostrations, offerings, flowers, and so on.

original: nas ston pa'i tshhogs tshhad dam ma tshhogs na yang ci 'byor pa'i bsreg rdzas bsags nas/_thab
analyzed: nas ston pa'i tshhogs tshhad dam ma tshhogs na yang ci 'byor pa'i bsreg rdzas bsags nas/_thab
translated: If you have the resources, gather the burnt offerings as taught below.🔽In the center of the hearth, from A, there is a moon, and from a red Ka, there is a sun.

original: kyi dbus su a las zla ba/_ka dmar po las nyi ma'i steng du/_hum sngon po las 'od phar 'phro🔽sems can gyi don byas tshhur 'du dang bcas pa las bsgrub thabs bzhin du bcom ldan
analyzed: kyi dbus su a las zla ba/_ka dmar po las nyi ma'i steng du/_hum sngon po las 'od phar 'phro sems can gyi don byas tshhur 'du dang bcas pa las bsgrub thabs bzhin du bcom ldan
translated: Upon that, from a blue HŪṂ, light radiates out🔽and performs the benefit of sentient beings. The light returns and dissolves into the HŪṂ, which transforms into the Bhagavān Cakrasaṃvara with one face and two arms, as in the sādhana.

original: 'das zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bskyed la de nas rang mthun mtshhams kyis lha'i nga rgyal dran par byas
analyzed: 'das zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bskyed la de nas rang mthun mtshhams kyis lha'i nga rgyal dran par byas
translated: Then, recall the pride of the deity in accordance with your own text.

original: te/_rang gi snying ka'i 'od kyis/_nas yul yang tha mi dad/_rigs bzang po'i khyim nas me blangs te thab kyi
analyzed: te/_rang gi snying ka'i 'od kyis/_nas yul yang tha mi dad/_rigs bzang po'i khyim nas me blangs te thab kyi
translated: Take fire from a good family’s home and place it in the center of the hearth.🔽Cover it with salt and kusha grass or, if that is not available, with something similar.

original: dbus su bcug la rtshwa ku sha 'am med na zor pas steng nas g.yogs la ras sam rnga ma dkar po'o/_/ye shes
analyzed: dbus su bcug la rtshwa ku sha 'am med na zor pas steng nas g.yogs la ras sam rnga ma dkar po'o/_/ye shes
translated: Place a white cloth or white rope on top of that.🔽Think that the wisdom being is seated there and bless it with the three syllables.🔽Think that the mother confers empowerment on the crown of one’s head.

original: sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang /_yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / yum gyis dbang bskur bar dbang drags su spyi bor rdo rje rtshe lnga pa gcig bsam de bdag gi rgyud la myur du skye
analyzed: sems dpa' bzhugs pa dang /_yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / yum gyis dbang bskur bar dbang drags su spyi bor rdo rje rtshe lnga pa gcig bsam de bdag gi rgyud la myur du skye
translated: Think that the wisdom being will quickly arise in one’s continuum.

original: bar mdzod bsam la/_de nas rlung yab kyis me sbar te/_de'i sngar bskyed pa'i dbus
analyzed: bar mdzod bsam la/_de nas rlung yab kyis me sbar te/_de'i sngar bskyed pa'i dbus
translated: Then, light the fire with a fan.🔽Think that the Bhagavat is seated in the center of the fire and look at the clear image.

original: su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par bsams te gsal ba la bltas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
analyzed: su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par bsams te gsal ba la bltas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ba
translated: Think that the Bhagavat

original: spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du khro bo'i tshhogs spro ba dang bsdu ba dang bcas
analyzed: spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du khro bo'i tshhogs spro ba dang bsdu ba dang bcas
translated: emits and reabsorbs a multitude of wrathful ones from the pores of his body, like the rays of the sun.

original: pas sems can don byed pa bsams la dang po nyer spyad lnga rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul de nas spyi'i sbyin bsreg bya
analyzed: pas sems can don byed pa bsams la dang po nyer spyad lnga rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul de nas spyi'i sbyin bsreg bya
translated: Then, thinking of benefiting sentient beings, first offer the five close enjoyments with the individual mantras. Then, the general burnt offering is:

original: ba ni/_om hri ha ha hum hum phat ma ma ste bdag gi sdig sgrib thams cad zhi sarba ro ga sarba bi ban shan
analyzed: ba ni/_om hri ha ha hum hum phat ma ma ste bdag gi sdig sgrib thams cad zhi sarba ro ga sarba bi ban shan
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Mama sarva pāpaṃ śodhaya sarva kleśaṃ śodhaya sarva vajra pāpaṃ

original: ting ku ru ye swa ha/_yod na dgang lugs kyis dbul med na lag pa bkrus nas g.yon pa'i sor mo gsum gyis
analyzed: ting ku ru ye swa ha/_yod na dgang lugs kyis dbul med na lag pa bkrus nas g.yon pa'i sor mo gsum gyis
translated: sarva siddhiṃ kuruye svāhā. If you have the ritual ladle, offer with that. If not, wash your hands and offer with the three fingers of your left hand.🔽It is taught that you should offer with the mantra, “May all my negativities and obscurations be pacified.”

original: dbul gsung /_bdag gi sdig sgrib thams cad shan+tim ku ru ye swa ha/_shing ngo ma dang me tog dkar po can sor bzhi tsham du
analyzed: dbul gsung /_bdag gi sdig sgrib thams cad shan+tim ku ru ye swa ha/_shing ngo ma dang me tog dkar po can sor bzhi tsham du
translated: Cut white flowers, such as jasmine, into four-finger lengths and offer them.

original: btubs la 'bul ba'o/_/'di thams cad kyi mgor yi ge bdun pa dang /_bsham du bdag gi sdig sgrib sha ku ru ye swa ha/
analyzed: btubs la 'bul ba'o/_/'di thams cad kyi mgor yi ge bdun pa dang /_bsham du bdag gi sdig sgrib sha ku ru ye swa ha/
translated: At the beginning of all of these, insert the seven-syllable mantra and at the end, “May all my negativities and obscurations be pacified.”🔽Offer the ritual ladle of clarified butter.

original: ces pa de 'jug pa'o mar gyi dgang lugs dbul bar bya'o/_/om hri ha ha hum hum phat/_om badzra
analyzed: ces pa de 'jug pa'o mar gyi dgang lugs dbul bar bya'o/_/om hri ha ha hum hum phat/_om badzra
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Oṃ vajra puṣpe āḥ hūṃ.

original: dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga
translated: The Ritual of the Single Hero Fire Offering

original: yag sha nya ye swa ha/_yam shing gi'o/_/_hri ha ha bdag ha hu~m phat sarba pa pam da
analyzed: yag sha nya ye swa ha/_yam shing gi'o/_/_hri ha ha bdag ha hu~m phat sarba pa pam da
translated: Hri ha ha bdag ha hum phat sarva papaṃ🔽dahan vajra ya svaha.🔽This is for the sesame seeds.🔽Khasarva vigan dhaya svaha.

original: ha na badzra ya swa ha/_til gyi'o/_/khasarba bi gan d+ha ye swa ha/_nyungs dkar
analyzed: ha na badzra ya swa ha/_til gyi'o/_/khasarba bi gan d+ha ye swa ha/_nyungs dkar
translated: This is for the white mustard seeds.🔽Furthermore,🔽om vajra ayushi svaha.

original: gyi'o/_/gzhan yang /_sman dang rin po che sogs om badzra a yu she swa ha/_dur ba'i 'o/_/
analyzed: gyi'o/_/gzhan yang /_sman dang rin po che sogs om badzra a yu she swa ha/_dur ba'i 'o/_/
translated: This is for the medicine, precious substances, and so forth.🔽Om apratihata ha ha yai svaha.🔽This is for the kusha grass.

original: om a pra te ha ha ye swa ha/_ku sha'i 'o/_/sarba sam ba de swa ha zhes lan gnyis su brjod
analyzed: om a pra te ha ha ye swa ha/_ku sha'i 'o/_/sarba sam ba de swa ha zhes lan gnyis su brjod
translated: Om sarva sambade svaha.🔽This is for the curd and rice.🔽Om vajra maha veye svaha.

original: na/_zho dang 'bras chan gyi'o/_/om badzra ma ha be ye swa ha/_nas kyi'o/_/om badzra
analyzed: na/_zho dang 'bras chan gyi'o/_/om badzra ma ha be ye swa ha/_nas kyi'o/_/om badzra
translated: This is for the barley.🔽Om vajra vijaye svaha.🔽This is for the wheat.🔽Om vajra ghasmariye svaha.

original: bi dza ye swa ha/_'bras so ba'i 'o/_/_om badzra g+has ma ri ye swa ha/_gro'i 'o/_/_om
analyzed: bi dza ye swa ha/_'bras so ba'i 'o/_/_om badzra g+has ma ri ye swa ha/_gro'i 'o/_/_om
translated: This is for the beans.🔽Om vajra pushtaye svaha.🔽This is for the ground rice.🔽Om maha bala yai svaha.

original: badzra pus ta ye swa ha/_'bras drus pa'i 'o/_/a+o~m ma ha ba la ye swa ha lag pa g.yon
analyzed: badzra pus ta ye swa ha/_'bras drus pa'i 'o/_/a+o~m ma ha ba la ye swa ha lag pa g.yon
translated: This is for the left hand.

original: pas thab khung du dbul ba'o/_/sran ma'i 'o/_/zhes mdor bstan pa de nyid ji ltar bya ba ni ci 'byor pa'i
analyzed: pas thab khung du dbul ba'o/_/sran ma'i 'o/_/zhes mdor bstan pa de nyid ji ltar bya ba ni ci 'byor pa'i
translated: The offering of the five offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five ambrosias is the offering of the five nectars.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches.🔽The offering of the five fire offerings is the offering into the hearth.🔽The offering of the five articles is the offering of whatever articles one has.🔽The offering of the five services is the offering of the five services.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.

original: yo byad kyis mchod par bya'o sbyin sreg go/_/me'i mchod pa lnga 'dir ma byed do/_/de nas nyer spyad
analyzed: yo byad kyis mchod par bya'o sbyin sreg go/_/me'i mchod pa lnga 'dir ma byed do/_/de nas nyer spyad
translated: The offering of the five prostrations is the offering of the five prostrations.🔽The offering of the five lamps is the offering of the five lamps.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches.🔽The offering of the five articles is the offering of whatever articles one has.🔽The offering of the five services is the offering of the five services.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five prostrations is the offering of the five prostrations.🔽The offering of the five lamps is the offering of the five lamps.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches.🔽The offering of the five articles is the offering of whatever articles one has.🔽The offering of the five services is the offering of the five services.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five prostrations is the offering of the five prostrations.🔽The offering of the five lamps is the offering of the five lamps.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches.

original: lnga dbul lo/_//grangs kyang nyi shu rtsha cig gam lnga bcu rtsha bzhi 'am/_brgya rtsha brgyad🔽dam/_stong ngam khri 'am 'bum rdzogs kyi bar du de ltar byas te rdzas zad pa dang 'dod pa'i
analyzed: lnga dbul lo/_//grangs kyang nyi shu rtsha cig gam lnga bcu rtsha bzhi 'am/_brgya rtsha brgyad dam/_stong ngam khri 'am 'bum rdzogs kyi bar du de ltar byas te rdzas zad pa dang 'dod pa'i
translated: The offering of the five articles is the offering of whatever articles one has.🔽The offering of the five services is the offering of the five services.🔽The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five prostrations is the offering of the five prostrations.🔽The offering of the five lamps is the offering of the five lamps.

original: don gsol ba gdab pa ni bya'o/_/de nas lha la dngos grub blangs pa ni dngos grub slangs pa bya ste🔽zhes mdor bstan pa de nyid ji ltar bya ba ni/_rdo rje sems dpa' nye bar byon ste stong pa dang snying rje tha
analyzed: don gsol ba gdab pa ni bya'o/_/de nas lha la dngos grub blangs pa ni dngos grub slangs pa bya ste🔽zhes mdor bstan pa de nyid ji ltar bya ba ni/_rdo rje sems dpa' nye bar byon ste stong pa dang snying rje tha
translated: The offering of the five praises is the offering of the five praises.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches.🔽The offering of the five articles is

analyzed: mi dad pa/_/'di kun sreg rdzas bgrang bar ni gsung bar sngar bstan pa'i sbyin bsreg gi rim pa de lta bu re la re re byas pa'i grangs 'di rnams ci grub tu byed pa'o/_/de yang rang dang gzhan gyi nad zhi ba sogs kyi don du byed na las ma
translated: The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”

original: grub bar du byed sdig pa zhi bar byed na mi grub tu byed pa'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su gnang bar🔽ste skye ba'i skal ba dang ldan par mjo mdzod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la ste skyes pa de 'phel 'grib
analyzed: grub bar du byed sdig pa zhi bar byed na mi grub tu byed pa'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su gnang bar ste skye ba'i skal ba dang ldan par mjo mdzod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la ste skyes pa de 'phel 'grib
translated: The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”

analyzed: med par brtan par dgongs par mdzod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag des rgyud la yod pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad nyid sbyang bar mdzod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' pas bdag gi sems bcud
translated: The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”

analyzed: stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin du bdag la rjes chags mdzod/_/rdo rje sems
translated: The number of offerings to be made in the fire is stated in the lines “I offer all these things that are to be burned.”🔽The number of offerings to be made in

original: dpa' des 'khor ba dang ngan song gi du kha las bdag nyid gso bar mdzod/_/bdag nyid
analyzed: dpa' des 'khor ba dang ngan song gi du kha las bdag nyid gso bar mdzod/_/bdag nyid
translated: You, the hero, should heal yourself from the smoke of samsara and the lower realms.

original: 'dod pa'i 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'i pa'i dngos grub thams cad rtshol/_/bdag gi las🔽rnams dge bar dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ste lung ma bstan kyang dge bar sgyur ba dang mi dge
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa'i pa'i dngos grub thams cad rtshol/_/bdag gi las rnams dge bar dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ste lung ma bstan kyang dge bar sgyur ba dang mi dge
translated: You should seek all the mundane and supramundane siddhis that you desire.🔽You should transform my actions into virtue, whether they are virtuous, nonvirtuous, or neutral.🔽You should transform even nonvirtuous actions into virtue.

original: ba yang dag nas 'bras bu mi 'byin par mdzod gcig pa la dge bar sgyur ces pa'o bsgyur/_/yi ge tshun gis ste
analyzed: ba yang dag nas 'bras bu mi 'byin par mdzod gcig pa la dge bar sgyur ces pa'o bsgyur/_/yi ge tshun gis ste
translated: You should transform nonvirtuous actions into virtue.

original: stong pa dang snying rjes tha mi dad pa'i sems la dpal du ste stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa skye bar mdzod/_/
analyzed: stong pa dang snying rjes tha mi dad pa'i sems la dpal du ste stong pa dang snying rje tha mi dad pa skye bar mdzod/_/
translated: You should generate the glory of the mind that is inseparable emptiness and compassion.

original: bcom ldan ho'i dgyes shing dgyes par ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bskyed par mdzod/_/rdo rje
analyzed: bcom ldan ho'i dgyes shing dgyes par ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bskyed par mdzod/_/rdo rje
translated: You should generate the connate bliss of the Bhagavān’s joy.

original: sems dpa' bdag las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las ni grol bar mdzod/_/dam tshhig ste mi
analyzed: sems dpa' bdag las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las ni grol bar mdzod/_/dam tshhig ste mi
translated: You should liberate me, Vajrasattva, from the bondage of karma and affliction.🔽You should liberate me, Vajrasattva, from the bondage of karma and affliction.

original: 'da' ba'i chen po'i sems dpar ste stong pa snying rje tha mi dad pa bdag mdzod cig_/om badzra swa
analyzed: 'da' ba'i chen po'i sems dpar ste stong pa snying rje tha mi dad pa bdag mdzod cig_/om badzra swa
translated: Om vajra satva ah.

analyzed: ta a/_ces brjod nas gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas/_/sbyin bsreg gis legs byas pa

translated: whatever I have done in error,

original: bya ba la sogs tshhigs bcad gcig brjod pas pas shes sems dpa' 'og min du gshegs su gsol la/
analyzed: bya ba la sogs tshhigs bcad gcig brjod pas pas shes sems dpa' 'og min du gshegs su gsol la/
translated: By reciting one verse, such as “Action and so on,” request the wisdom-being bodhisattva to depart.

original: om badzra zhes pas dam tshhig sems dpa' lus la gzhug go//_//
analyzed: om badzra zhes pas dam tshhig sems dpa' lus la gzhug go//_//
translated: With “oṃ vajra,” the pledge-being bodhisattva enters your body.

original: 'di kun gyi lugs kyis rdzas bdud rtshi lngar bskyed pa 'di sa bon las mi bskyod par skad cig gis bskyed nas
analyzed: 'di kun gyi lugs kyis rdzas bdud rtshi lngar bskyed pa 'di sa bon las mi bskyod par skad cig gis bskyed nas
translated: In all these systems, the five substances are generated from the seeds. After generating Akṣobhya instantly,

original: de'i steng du sa bon bskyed pas byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/kha dog ni bdud rtshi lnga rang rang gi kha dog yin pas hum mthing ka
analyzed: de'i steng du sa bon bskyed pas byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/kha dog ni bdud rtshi lnga rang rang gi kha dog yin pas hum mthing ka
translated: blessing is performed by generating the seed on top of that. The colors are the natural colors of the five substances: hūṃ is blue,🔽and so on.

original: sogs/_'dir bdud rtshi lnga las sha lnga med gsung slob dpon 'gar pa ri pas mdzad pa/
analyzed: sogs/_'dir bdud rtshi lnga las sha lnga med gsung slob dpon 'gar pa ri pas mdzad pa/
translated: Here, the five meats are not generated from the five seeds.

original: dpa' bo cig pa'i sbyin bsreg rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpa' bo cig pa'i sbyin bsreg rdzogs so//
translated: The fire offering of the single hero is complete.
